description: Try our easy to follow Quinoa, Almond & Craisin Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quinoa, Almond & Craisin Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Lightly grease 20 x 30cm baking tin and line base with baking paper, allowing it to overhang on the long sides.
Combine quinoa flakes, almond meal, gluten free self-raising flour and cinnamon in a large mixing bowl. Stir in dried cranberries and orange rind.

Place eggs, organic honey, sunflower oil and vanilla extract in a second bowl. Whisk to combine. Stir wet ingredients to dry ingredients to combine. Pour mixture into prepared tin and smooth surface. Bake for 20 minutes, or until golden and a skewer inserted in to the centre comes out clean.
Set aside to cool for 5 minutes, then remove from tin using paper handles and set aside on a wire rack to cool completely. Cut into squares. Dust with pure icing sugar. Serve.
